column4: its a 3.4 gig textfile, I had to sudo nautilus it because I could not move it to my other partition without it
The trash file is hidden somewhere but I dont know where

for /  , 10g is enough , then create a separate /home partition , ext4 as well. Then the next time you want to upgrade with a clean install , you can install the OS to / and your /home partiton with all your data will be untouched and saved
